sourcesContent:
export default {
  colors: {
    background: "#fff",
    text: "#464444",
    paper: "#fff",
    neutral: "#fff",
    primary: "#07c",
    secondary: "#05a",
    accent: "#4287f5",
    muted: "#95aac9",
    // muted: '#f0f0f0',
    borderShadow: "hsl(0, 0%, 85%)",
    card: "#fcfcfc",
    modes: {
      dark: {
        text: "#fff",
        paper: "#383838",
        neutral: "#545454",
        primary: "#0cf",
        borderShadow: "hsl(0, 0%, 40%)",
        secondary: "#09c",
        accent: "#4287f5",
        muted: "#3d3d3d",
        card: "#6f6f6f",
        blue: "#144778",
      },
    },
    // Shades
    night: "#383838",
    dark: "#000",
    charcoal: "#595a6f",
    concrete: "#95aac9",
    // Colors
    blue: "hsla(212, 100%, 41%, 1)",
    cobalt: "#25294a",
    red: "#f4516c",
    green: "#a1c900",
    rust: "#b34a4a",
    purple: "#716aca",
    turquoise: "#3ba0ac",
    orange: "#c67a18",
    smoke: "#f5f5f5",
    // gray: '#e8e8e8',
    gray: "#f6f9fc",
    solitude: "#e3e8ee",
  },
  gradients: {
    // Brand Gradient Styles
    primary: ["#2855de", "#466fec"],
    seconday: ["#2855de", "#466fec"],
    tertiary: ["#2855de", "#466fec"],
    // charcoal: ['#383838', '#000'],

    // Color Special
    amin: ["#8E2DE2", "#4A00E0"],
    navy: ["#0f0c29", "#302b63", "#24243e"],
    sunset: ["#ee0979", "#ff6a00"],
    frost: ["#000428", "#004e92"],
    sherbert: ["#f79d00", "#64f38c"],
    mild: ["#67B26F", "#4ca2cd"],

    // Generic Gradient Styles
    black: ["#232526", "#414345"],
    blueOcean: ["#56ccf2", "#3a95ee", "#2f80ed"],
    bluePurple: ["#2583b0", "#7324cc"],
    blueZodiac: ["#3f4257", "#333965"],
    blueDeep: ["#343b6b", "#262a46"],
    blue: ["#46a7ec", "#282ede"],
    blueDark: [" #4f5798", "#383f7d"],
    charcoal: ["#222", "#353535"],
    green: ["#a1c900", "#00af4e"],
    gray: ["#f4f4f4", "#f2f2f2"],
    purple: ["#7d3eb4", "#e430ad"],
    purpink: ["#57489F", "#8e489f", "#433caf"],
    turquoise: ["#3ba0ac", "#3ba0ac"],
    orange: ["#fb3306", "#ffa319"],
    orangish: ["#ffb123", "#e9a100"],
    red: ["#ef473a", "#cb2d3e"],
    cloudy: ["#f8f8f8", "#FFF"],
    white: ["#FFF", "#fefefe"],
  },
  palette: {
    primary: {
      bg: "primary",
      borderColor: "primary",
      gradient: "primary",
      color: "white",
    },
    blue: {
      bg: "blue",
      borderColor: "blue",
      gradient: "blue",
      color: "white",
    },
    green: {
      bg: "green",
      borderColor: "green",
      gradient: "green",
      color: "white",
    },
  },
};
